sn21.3:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn21.3:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno rājagahe viharanti veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe ekavihāre.
sn21.3:4.4: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn21.3:4.6: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn21.3:4.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca:
sn21.3:5.2: parisuddho mukhavaṇṇo pariyodāto santena nūnāyasmā mahāmoggallāno ajja vihārena vihāsī”ti.
sn21.3:5.4: Api ca me ahosi dhammī kathā”ti.
sn21.3:5.5: “Kena saddhiṃ panāyasmato mahāmoggallānassa ahosi dhammī kathā”ti?
sn21.3:5.6: “Bhagavatā kho me, āvuso, saddhiṃ ahosi dhammī kathā”ti.
sn21.3:5.7: “Dūre kho, āvuso, bhagavā etarahi sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn21.3:5.8: Kiṃ nu kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ iddhiyā upasaṅkami;
sn21.3:5.9: udāhu bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ iddhiyā upasaṅkamī”ti?
sn21.3:5.12: Api ca me yāvatā bhagavā ettāvatā dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibbā ca sotadhātu.
sn21.3:5.13: Bhagavatopi yāvatāhaṃ ettāvatā dibbacakkhu visujjhi dibbā ca sotadhātū”ti.
sn21.3:5.14: “Yathākathaṃ panāyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhagavatā saddhiṃ ahosi dhammī kathā”ti?
sn21.3:6.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, āraddhavīriyo hotī’ti?
sn21.3:6.4: Evaṃ vutte, maṃ, āvuso, bhagavā etadavoca:
sn21.3:6.6: kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, sarīre upassussatu maṃsalohitaṃ, yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti.
sn21.3:6.8: Evaṃ kho me, āvuso, bhagavatā saddhiṃ ahosi dhammī kathā”ti.
sn21.3:7.1: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, himavato pabbatarājassa parittā pāsāṇasakkharā yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya;
sn21.3:7.2: evameva kho mayaṃ āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya.
sn21.3:7.3: Āyasmā hi mahāmoggallāno mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo ākaṅkhamāno kappaṃ tiṭṭheyyā”ti.
sn21.3:8.1: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, mahatiyā loṇaghaṭāya parittā loṇasakkharāya yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya;
sn21.3:8.2: evameva kho mayaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāya.
sn21.3:8.3: Āyasmā hi sāriputto bhagavatā anekapariyāyena thomito vaṇṇito pasattho:
sn21.3:10.1: Itiha te ubho mahānāgā aññamaññassa subhāsitaṃ sulapitaṃ samanumodiṃsūti.
